description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=2/3. The grand finale of the Island Adventure point and click adventure series is here! Will you find a way to get home? What will happen to the girls? And what of the creatures? Multiple endings dependant on choices made Includes side by side 3d version (suitable 3D TV/Monitor needed for 3D)
